com.kakao.friends.response.model

Class FriendInfo

  • package com.kakao.friends.response.model
public class FriendInfo
extends AppFriendInfo
implements com.kakao.auth.common.MessageSendable, com.kakao.usermgmt.response.model.User
    Friend 에 대한 정보. FriendsService.requestFriends(ApiResponseCallback, FriendContext)를 이용하여 얻을 수 있음.
